channel.title: COMPILER really need help!
channel.description:
Compiler help Hey im having abit of difficulties getting the compiler to work for some reason every time i press compiler in the source folder it says
" Compiling... Javac: file not found: src/org/echo/*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use- helpp for a list of possible options press any keey too continue" [B
My current command @echo off title Compiler echo Compiling... "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.7.0_45/bin/javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/org/echo/*.java pause
Guys i tried everything to get this compiler fixed still getting no luck at all! if anyone can teamview & fix this i would really really would really really really appreciate it

item.title: COMPILER really need help!
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

Maybe your server doesn’t have that certain directory…That’s what I read from the error, I’m not entirely sure, I only know the fundamentals.

Read full topic

item.title: COMPILER really need help!
item.dc:creator: @Revolution.2013 Revolution.2013
item.description:
@Revolution.2013 wrote:

Compiler help
Hey im having abit of difficulties getting the compiler to work for some reason
every time i press compiler in the source folder it says

" Compiling…
Javac: file not found: src/org/echo/*.java
Usage: javac
use- helpp for a list of possible options
press any keey too continue"
[B

My current command
@echo off
title Compiler
echo Compiling…
“C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.7.0_45/bin/javac.exe” -d bin -cp lib/; -sourcepath src src/org/echo/.java
pause

Guys i tried everything to get this compiler fixed still getting no luck at all! if anyone can teamview & fix this i would really really would really really really appreciate it

Read full topic
